text: The Women's team sprint competition at the 2018 UCI Track Cycling World Championships was held on 28 February 2018.ScheduleStart list ==Results== ===Qualifying=== The eight fastest teams advance to the first round.Qualifying results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- ! Rank !! Nation !! Time !! Behind !! Rank !! Overall rank !! Nation !! Time !! Behind !!
